fields.name: Ominous aura (passive):
fields.value: Anyone who visits you attacks themselves with a 1.15x attack

fields.name: Disorienting signal (0x, 80% charge):
fields.value: all investigative actions tonight will fail

fields.name: Constructs (locked, charge 160%):
fields.value: unlocked when placed in top 3, target one player, they will gain the “ominous aura” passive
